sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TOUR_CMPNY( CMPNY_CODE , CMPNY_NM , CMPNY_INTRCN , ADRES , TELNO , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DE ) VALUES( LPAD(SQ_CMPNY_CODE.NEXTVAL, 10, '0') , #CMPNY_NM# , #CMPNY_INTRCN:CLOB# , #ADRES# , #TELNO# , 'N' , #WRITNG_ID# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_TOUR_CMPNY SET CMPNY_NM = #CMPNY_NM# , CMPNY_INTRCN = #CMPNY_INTRCN:CLOB# , ADRES = #ADRES# , TELNO = #TELNO# , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE CMPNY_CODE = #CMPNY_CODE#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_TOUR_CMPNY SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE CMPNY_CODE = #CMPNY_CODE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CMPNY_CODE , CMPNY_NM , CMPNY_INTRCN , ADRES , TELNO , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DE FROM TB_TOUR_CMPNY WHERE CMPNY_CODE = #CMPNY_CODE#

SELECT CMPNY_CODE , CMPNY_NM , CMPNY_INTRCN , ADRES , TELNO , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DE FROM TB_TOUR_CMPNY WHERE 1 = 1
AND DELETE_AT = #SCH_DELETE_AT#
AND CMPNY_NM LIKE #SCH_CMPNY_NM#||'%'
ORDER BY WRITNG_DE, CMPNY_CODE
